_sText:
de _ sss _ makarska ~40 players (2oCT-2oT)
~NAV included
~2 bomb sites
~3D skybox
~Well balanced
~Custom Textures
~Custom Models
~Hidden Rooms
This map is based on an IRL location.
It's my high school that I attended for 3 years. :)
I made it look nicer than it actually is (trust me).
Building time was around 2-3 months and detail about 2 extra months.
I believe this will be my last map for a longer period of time as of now.
I assure you all it is worth the download and I hope it goes viral to the point it is used on many servers.
Thanks to everyone for their support.
And a very special thank you to ALEX for his building prefabs.



*********************************************
6/3/2011

Fixed decal showing on tiles in building.
Fixed secret sound playing on c4 explosion.
Fixed additional problems. ********************************************* Fixed secret door to automatically shut on map spawn if secret door is opened on previous round.
*********************************************
